DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term safety once-daily application Omiganan topical gel subject severe papulopustular rosacea .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Long-term Safety Once-Daily Omiganan Topical Gel
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy , male nonpregnant female subject , 18 year age old . 2 . A diagnosis severe papulopustular rosacea use Investigator Global Assessment grade scale baseline 3 . Subjects presence telangiectasia Baseline 4 . Subjects presence facial erythema associate rosacea Baseline 1 . Subjects steroid rosacea subtype 3 ( phymatous rosacea ) . 2 . Subjects nodular rosacea 3 . Standard exclusion criterion .
